a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(c - (a - b) if c - (a - b) > 0 else 0)


# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2, c = bottle 3
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)


a, b, c = map(int, input().split()) # a, b, c = int(input().split()) はダメ

print(c - (a - b))

# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2
a, b, c = map(int, input().split(' '))

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(c - (a - b))

# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)
